name: One Star
description: One Star - space 2D shooter. In the game waiting for you will find a lot of space battles against with enemy races.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel® Pentium® III or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
